record.dc:title: 44Lu92 Koger's Island, Lauderdale County, Alabama. Burial #23 with associated grave goods.
record.dc:creator: B.C. Refshauge
record.wpa:narrative: Upper extremity of Burial #23 with associated grave goods. F.S. #96 (marine conch) by right hand; F.S. #s 97-100 (bone awls) inside conch; F.S. #104 (stone palette) beneath conch; F.S. #79 (8 marine conch beads) by right hand; F.S. #81 (14 bird sterna) over conch beads; F.S. #70 (greenstone celt) on right humerus; F.S. #s 66 & 94 (copper ear spools) on either side of the skull; F.S. #95 (958 columnella beads) around neck; F.S. #109 (bone ear pin) to the left of skull; F.S. #71 (greenstone celt) on left humerus; F.S. #74 (dog effigy pipe) on left humerus; F.S. #80 (8 marine columnella beads); F.S. #82 (14 bird sterna) by columnella beads; F.S. #75 (greenstone spade) over left ribs and upper left pelvis; F.S. #110 (galena cube) on sacrum; F.S. #78 (10 beaten copper effigy plates) by left femur; F.S. #77 (2 drilled bear teeth) with copper plates. Many other field specimens are not visible in the photograph.
